channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is Tim Walz Actually a ‘Permission’ Slip for White-Dude Voters?

item.title: U.S. economy is on the cusp of another Roaring ’20s, says UBS
item.description: "By early 2025 only the most pessimistic investors will need rose-colored glasses to see a clear path to a Roaring ’20s outcome," a UBS analyst says.

item.title: Government Wants To Ban Everything That Helps Keep Humans Alive
